text: Windows Defender (which used to be called Microsoft AntiSpyware), is an application made by Microsoft. It was released on October 24, 2006. Windows Defender prevents, quarantines, and removes spywares in Windows Vista and Windows 7. It also prevents computer viruses in Windows 8 and above. It can also be downloaded for free for Windows XP and Windows Server 2003. ==Related pages== *Microsoft Security Essentials ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Antivirus software Category:Microsoft software
title: Windows Defender
